biotools.summary: scShaper is a tool for linear trajectory inference from single-cell RNA-seq data through discrete pseudotime estimation using Shortest HAmiltonian path PERmuted clustering. scShaper is an R package implementing a new trajectory inference method, which enables accurate and fast linear trajectory inference from single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data.

bioschemas.name: scShaper
bioschemas.summary: scShaper is a tool for linear trajectory inference from single-cell RNA-seq data through discrete pseudotime estimation using Shortest HAmiltonian path PERmuted clustering. scShaper is an R package implementing a new trajectory inference method, which enables accurate and fast linear trajectory inference from single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data.
